price: "Os que crêem e não confundem sua fé com injustiça, esses têm a segurança e são guiados"
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَمۡ يَلۡبِسُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنَهُم بِظُلۡمٍ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡأَمۡنُ وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū walam yalbisū īmānahum biẓul'min ulāika lahumu al-amnu wahum muh'tadūna
